timeline.bodyText: ClosetWinDependencyMediation or FirstOccurrenceDependencyMediation? DependencyMediation is a generic term and this class follows Maven's closest-win way.
timeline.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText:
It's a bit odd that DependencyMediation class does not have logic to traverse a tree. Because of that, its put and selects interface cannot implement Gradle's highest-win dependency mediation.
(I don't expect this PR to address that concern; just writing down what I felt)
timeline.author: suztomo
